mapper.select: SELECT a.project_application_sq AS applicationSq, p.project_sq AS projectSq, p.project_ttl AS projectTitle, c.company_nm AS companyTitle, a.project_application_created_at_dtm AS appliedDt, a.selected_interview_dtm AS interviewDt, r.resume_sq AS resumeSq, r.resume_ttl AS resumeTitle, p.project_candidate_cnt AS applicantCnt, a.read_application_dtm AS readApplicationDt, cc.common_code_nm AS applicantType, CASE WHEN p.project_recruit_end_dt < CURDATE() THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isRecruitEnded FROM TBL_RESUME_M r JOIN TBL_PROJECT_APPLICATION_H a ON r.resume_sq = a.resume_sq JOIN TBL_PROJECT_M p ON a.project_sq = p.project_sq JOIN TBL_COMPANY_S c ON p.company_sq = c.company_sq JOIN TBL_COMMON_CODE_C cc ON a.project_application_status_cd = cc.common_code_sq WHERE r.user_sq = #{userSq} ORDER BY a.project_application_created_at_dtm DESC
SELECT CASE project_application_member_type_cd WHEN 301 THEN '개인' WHEN 302 THEN '기업' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END FROM TBL_PROJECT_APPLICATION_H WHERE project_application_sq = #{applicationSq}

SELECT read_application_dtm AS readResumeDt, project_application_created_at_dtm AS appDt, selected_interview_dtm AS interviewDt, CASE project_application_status_cd WHEN 801 THEN '지원중' WHEN 802 THEN '불합격' WHEN 803 THEN '합격' WHEN 804 THEN '인터뷰 요청 중' WHEN 805 THEN '인터뷰 확정' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS appStatus FROM TBL_PROJECT_APPLICATION_H WHERE project_application_sq = #{appSq}
